titles.title: Tho' Your Sins Be As Scarlet (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tho' your sins be as scarlet They shall be as white as snow Tho' your sins be as scarlet They shall be white as snow Tho' they be red like crimson They shall be as wool Tho' your sins be as scarlet Tho' your sins be as scarlet They shall be as white as snow They shall be as white as snow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hear the voice that entreats you O return ye unto God Hear the voice that entreats you O return ye unto God He is of great compassion And of wondrous love Hear the voice that entreats you Hear the voice that entreats you O return ye unto God O return ye unto God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He'll forgive your transgressions And remember them no more He'll forgive your transgressions And remember them no more Look unto me ye people Saith the Lord your God He'll forgive your transgressions He'll forgive your transgressions And remember them no more And remember them no more{/lang-eng}
